  • Method Details

    • applyIconColorToBuilder

      public static void applyIconColorToBuilder(android.content.Context context, Object builder)
      Applies the globally configured icon color to the provided notification builder. Retrieves the color from NotificationsPreference.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      builder - The Notification.Builder or NotificationCompat.Builder instance.

    • postCreate

      public static void postCreate(android.content.Context context, android.app.NotificationManager notificationManager, android.app.Notification notification, NotificationDetails notificationDetails, String notifUUID)

    • createNotification

    • createCompatBuilder

      public static androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat.Builder createCompatBuilder(android.content.Context context, NotificationDetails notificationDetails)

    • createBuilder

      public static android.app.Notification.Builder createBuilder(android.content.Context context, NotificationDetails notificationDetails, int icon)
      Create notification builder. When an icon url in notification is sent or a large icon has been assigned and if API 23 or greater, the notification will assign a large icon.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      notificationDetails - NotificationDetails object.
      icon - Icon integer value to look up resource to set as small icon in notification.
      Returns:
      Notification.Builder object.

    • createNotificationCompat

      public static android.app.Notification createNotificationCompat(android.content.Context context, android.os.Bundle extras, NotificationDetails notificationDetails, int icon, int actionFlags, Class<?> cls, UUID notifUUID)
